j.console¶

  • path: /core/console/Console.py

class which groups functionality to print to a console self.width=120 self.indent=0 #current indentation of messages send to console self.reformat=False #if True will make sure message fits nicely on screen

askIpaddressInRange¶

  • params: question,startip,endip,network,netmask,retry
